course.title: PSY 4174 Seminar in Evolutionary Psychology (3 units)
course.desc: Animal and human evolution, natural selection and adaptation. Sexual differentiation, brain and behaviour: foraging behaviour, parental investment and strategies, male-female relationships and mate choice, polyandry and polygyny, parent-offspring conflict, cooperation and altruism. Current research in evolutionary psychology.Course Component: SeminarPrerequisite: 81 university units including PSY 1101, PSY 1102, PSY 2174, (PSY 3103 or PSY 3108 or PSY 3377). Reserved for students registered in the Major, Joint Honours and Honours programs in psychology.
